name: feedPortion_setValue
description: This function is used to set the amount of food for a pet's feeder.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the feed portion.

parameters.name: feedPortion
parameters.description: The amount of food to set for the pet's feeder.
